Title: Title
A title that will show up at the top of: A title that will show up at the top of your project pages.
A brief paragraph describing your projec: A brief paragraph describing your project.
A short name used in URLs for your proje: A short name used in URLs for your project which will be the repository name used on GitHub.
Please do not use spaces or punctuation: Please do not use spaces or punctuation other than hyphens.
Names will appear at the bottom of your: Names will appear at the bottom of your project pages. If left blank, the project owners GitHub username will show instead.
Start typing to search for users.
Tags are labels used in the interface to: Tags are labels used in the interface to index, organize, and discover topics in the annotations. Categories can be used to organize the tags in groups.
Project Slug should only contain alphanu: Project Slug should only contain alphanumeric characters and hyphens.
_private_repository_helper_text_: Private repositories do not generate GitHub Pages sites. Instead they will generate a static site and check it into your project repository.
_generate_pages_site_helper_text_: Generate a GitHub Pages site.  If unchecked a static site which you can deploy will be created and checked into your project repository.
